resources.string: "No activity found to resolve the given deep link"
"Play Services Not Found. Please install/update the latest play services version to be able to type deep links directly from the web"
Hi there! Would you please take out a few seconds to rate this app? The developer would really appreciate it :-)
Hi! You can test out android deep links without ADB, directly from your laptop browser or android phone using this tool: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.manoj.dlt
Just type your deep link here…
And when you return, your history will be saved!
Long click a deep link to add shortcut
